Hi {{profile.displayName}},

Shuga is proud to welcome HAO group as a Shuga partner! You can now expect up to 2.1% Cashback* on your groceries spend. They have 45 stores (and counting) islandwide so be sure to visit one near you now!

HAO Corp is the parent company of four retail formats consisting of HAO mart, HAO Halal Hub, HAO megamart, and Eccellente by HAO mart. Having different formats allows HAO Corp to better serve our customer’s needs, allowing us to provide the best shopping experience.

HAO mart

HAO mart is a network of convenience stores and supermarkets in Singapore under HAO Corp, which began its establishment in 2016. HAO mart expanded rapidly and has now opened more than 40 stores within a span of three years.

HAO Halal Hub

HAO Halal Hub is a network of Halal speciality stores under HAO Corp catering to the needs of our Muslim community. The first HAO Halal Hub was established in 2018 and now has more than 10 outlets islandwide.


HAO megamart

HAO megamart is HAO Corp’s largest outlet located at The Grandstand. Opened in 2019, HAO megamart sits on 46,000 sqft of land. This space allows HAO megamart to hond more than 30,000 SKUs ranging from electronics to consumer goods.


Eccellente by HAO mart

Eccellente by HAO mart is HAO Corp’s network of supermarkets providing an elevated retail experience at affordable prices. Eccellente by HAO mart allows customers to purchase international products in one store, while providing top notch customer service experience and affordability.


TERMS AND CONDITIONS APPLY.
Cashback is capped at $5.25 and only applicable to first time purchases at any HAO outlet
(HAO mart, Eccellente by HAO mart, HAO Halal Hub & HAO megamart)
Subsequent purchases are entitled to 0.7% UNLIMITED Cashback
Categories including (but not limited to) tobacco, newspapers/magazines, NPN products, phone cards or top-ups are not entitled for Cashback
All eligible receipts have to be submitted within 48 hours from purchase on Shuga App
